newsitem.title: UK: Baltic Exchange to launch a Handy-size index.
newsitem.headline: Baltic Exchange to launch a Handy-size index.

text.p: The Baltic Exchange said on Wednesday it plans to launch an index covering the Handy-size sector of the seaborne freight market in January 1997.
Trials will begin on September 3 this year. The index would be based on reports from eight international shipbrokers and issued at 1400 GMT on Tuesdays and Fridays.
A statement by Basil Mavroleon, chairman of the Baltic Freight Index Committee, said the shipping market had for some time been seeking a reliable and independent index to reflect Handy-size rates.
The panel of brokers will be J E Hyde, Howe Robinson, Clarkson, John F Dillon of the United States, Norway's Fearnleys A/S, Yamamizu Shipping Co Ltd of Japan, Galbraith's and Simpson, Spence & Young.
